Package cz.ive.location

Classes providing location management - creating of locations, path finding, object moving.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Area Interface describing an Area.
GraphArea Describing an area, where the contained WayPoints can be ordered in any graph.
GridArea Describing an area, where the contained WayPoints are always ordered in an two-dimensional grid.
IveMap World root holder
Jam Interface for storing informations about movement of objects, to delay evaluation of reactions on this movement.
MoveAware Interface for objects that are interested in being informed about some object movement between locations or for objects that themselves take care about this movement.
PathFinder Interface for path finding logic.
WayPoint Interface representing single WayPoint in the net of WayPoints which corresponds to single Area.
 

Class Summary
Area2DGrid Implements an area as a 2d grid - location containing a net of WayPoints in a two-dimensional full grid.
Area2DGrid.ExpansionInfo Encapsulates all information needed to expand grid area.
Area2DGrid.ExpansionInfo.GridException<T> Defines exceptions from default values of any member of the WayPoints in the grid.
CommonArea Common predecessor of all areas implementing methods, which are WayPoint-net-implementation independent.
CommonArea.GraphicTemplateStrings Identifies a graphic template.
CommonArea.InfluenceInfo Used to remember influence value between items of pair.
CommonArea.NeighbourInfo Class storing info about neighbourhood of WayPoints.
CommonArea.ObjectExpansionInfo Information needed for area expansion
CommonArea.PhantomGenerationInfo Information needed to generate phantoms of neighbours in another location.
DummyJamImpl Implementation of Jam interface used to bypass LodManager
Influence Encapsulation of WayPoint LOD influence.
IveMapImpl World root holder implementation
JamImpl Class storing informations about movement of objects, to delay evaluation of reactions on this movement.
Joint Joint represents walkable connection between two WayPoints.
Kind Kind of a location.
KindMap Just maps the diferent Strings used to identify waypoint Kind in the XML to the distinct integers.
PathFinderImpl General implementation of PathFinder.
SimpleArea Implements an area interface - location containing a net of WayPoints.
SimpleArea.ExpansionInfo All informations needed to instantiate sublocations
WayPointImpl An implementation of WayPoit.
 

Enum Summary
JamImpl.MovementType Types of movement messages
LocationState Lod related states of the location.
WayPoint.SpaceState States of the space on the WayPoint
 

Package cz.ive.location Description

Classes providing location management - creating of locations, path finding, object moving. There are classes for different types of locations like basic way point and superior area and classes for locations grids and maps.
